I'm constantly reading the tech headlines and always looking to see what's new in the world of interesting tech. I am particularly interested in seeing what new or innovative things have been discovered or worked on. I like to think about how they might be used in the future and how new tech can be applied to old problems. I absolutely loved reading about [itty.bitty sites](https://itty.bitty.site/#). I have no idea at the moment of the many use cases for this idea but it's a fascinating concept!
